    22â†’function parseFrontmatter(raw: string): { frontmatter: Record<string, unknown>; content: string } {
    23â†’    const match = raw.match(/^---\n([\s\S]*?)\n---\n([\s\S]*)$/);
    24â†’    if (!match) return { frontmatter: {}, content: raw };
    25â†’
    26â†’    const frontmatterStr = match[1];
    27â†’    const content = match[2];
    28â†’    const frontmatter: Record<string, unknown> = {};
    29â†’
    30â†’    for (const line of frontmatterStr.split('\n')) {
    31â†’        const colonIndex = line.indexOf(':');
    32â†’        if (colonIndex === -1) continue;
    33â†’        const key = line.slice(0, colonIndex).trim();
    34â†’        let value = line.slice(colonIndex + 1).trim();
    35â†’
    36â†’        if (value.startsWith('[') && value.endsWith(']')) {
    37â†’            frontmatter[key] = value.slice(1, -1).split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^["']|["']$/g, ''));
    38â†’        } else if (value.startsWith('"') && value.endsWith('"')) {
    39â†’            frontmatter[key] = value.slice(1, -1);
    40â†’        } else if (value === 'null') {
    41â†’            frontmatter[key] = null;
    42â†’        } else {
    43â†’            frontmatter[key] = value;
    44â†’        }
    45â†’    }
    46â†’    return { frontmatter, content };
    47â†’}
    48â†’
    49â†’function calculateReadingTime(content: string): number {
    50â†’    return Math.ceil(content.split(/\s+/).length / 200);
    51â†’}
    52â†’
    53â†’function extractSlugFromFilename(path: string): string {
    54â†’    const filename = path.split('/').pop() || '';
    55â†’    return filename.replace(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}-/, '').replace(/\.md$/, '');
    56â†’}
    57â†’
    58â†’function parseBlogPosts(): BlogPost[] {
    59â†’    return Object.entries(blogPostFiles)
    60â†’        .map(([path, module]) => {
    61â†’            const raw = (module as { default: string }).default;

    63â†’            const { frontmatter, content } = parseFrontmatter(raw);
    64â†’            return {
    65â†’                slug,
    66â†’                title: frontmatter.title as string || 'Untitled',

    69â†’                tags: (frontmatter.tags as string[]) || [],
